query: SELECT 'Total Blog Posts' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts UNION ALL SELECT 'Optimal Meta Desc (120-160)' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) BETWEEN 120 AND 160 UNION ALL SELECT 'Short Meta Desc (<120)' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) < 120 UNION ALL SELECT 'Long Meta Desc (>160)' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) > 160 UNION ALL SELECT 'Has Meta Title' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE metaTitle IS NOT NULL AND metaTitle != '' UNION ALL SELECT 'Has Featured Image' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE image IS NOT NULL AND image != '';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ijVUtDru4Z9cqPT.98f765e38313 --database YeXpL2RbTVxqVQqhWQzraf --execute SELECT 'Total Blog Posts' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts UNION ALL SELECT 'Optimal Meta Desc (120-160)' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) BETWEEN 120 AND 160 UNION ALL SELECT 'Short Meta Desc (<120)' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) < 120 UNION ALL SELECT 'Long Meta Desc (>160)' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) > 160 UNION ALL SELECT 'Has Meta Title' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE metaTitle IS NOT NULL AND metaTitle != '' UNION ALL SELECT 'Has Featured Image' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM blog_posts WHERE image IS NOT NULL AND image != '';
